attributes.action: review the increase in cost for GRO certificates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On behalf of the many thousands of genealogists I urge the Prime Minister
to review the increase in cost of a certificate from £7.00 to £9.25 an increase of
32%.


The majority of researchers would be happy to receive certificates by email
Thus cutting the costs and also the time involved, along with green issues
(paper/transport)

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to review the increase in cost for GRO certificates.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 


http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=grocertificates


Her Majesty's Government
